Name: Eggs-cellent
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of half Cadbury Creme Egg.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Brandy and advocaat (the eggy element) is a classic and indulgent combo that says Easter and/or Christmas – both spiritual holidays so the addition of Chartreuse is obvious. As this Eggs-cellent cocktail was made for Easter it had to have some chocolate so I added chocolate bitters.
History: Created in April 2017 by yours truly as an Easter Cocktail .
Nutrition: One serving of Eggs-cellent contains 275 calories
